Models¶

homeyess/website/models.py

class website.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store information about a user

Parameters

  • user (User) – the authentication object containing username, password, email (optional), first / last name

  • phone ((optional) CharField / string) – the user’s phone number

  • user_type (UserType) – the type of user (volunteer, homeless, company)

  • car_plate ((optional) CharField / string) – the license plate number of the volunteer’s car (only required for volunteer)

  • car_make ((optional) CharField / string) – the make of the volunteer’s car (only required for volunteer)

  • car_model ((optional) CharField / string) – the model of the volunteer’s car (only required for volunteer)

  • total_volunteer_minutes (int) – the total amount of time a volunteer has volunteered

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class UserType¶

Enum to represent types of users: Volunteer, Homeless, Company

class website.models.Ride(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store information about a ride request. Contains start / end time and location, the homeless person, and a volunteer if the ride has already been confirmed. Note that the object should be created when a ride request is made and altered when the request is updated (by homeless) or confirmed (by user).

Parameters

  • homeless (User) – the user who requested the ride

  • volunteer ((optional) User) – the user who volunteered to give the ride

  • interview_datetime (DateTime) – the date and time of the interview

  • interview_duration (int) – the time in minutes that the interview should last

  • volunteer_address (CharField / string) – the address the volunteer is coming from

  • pickup_address (CharField / string) – the address from which the homeless person should be picked up / dropped off

  • pickup_datetime (DateTime) – the date and time the homeless person should be picked up for their interview

  • interview_address (CharField / string) – the address of the interview

  • interview_company (CharField / string) – the company hosting the interview

  • end_datetime (DateTime) – the time the volunteer arrives back at their house

  • ride_status (RideStatus) – the status of the ride

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class RideStatus¶

Enum to represent the status of a ride: Unconfirmed (requested by homeless), Confirmed (matched with volunteer), Finished (already happened)

class website.models.JobPost(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store information about a job post

Parameters

  • company (User) – the company that made the post

  • created (Date) – the date the post was created

  • last_edited (Date) – the date the post was last edited

  • location (CharField / string) – the location of the job (city, county, etc.)

  • wage (CharField / string) – how much the job will pay (can be hourly, salary, etc.)

  • hours (CharField / string) – the time commitment of the job

  • job_title (CharField / string) – the title of the job (e.g. janitor)

  • short_summary (CharField / string) – a short summary of the job description

  • description (Text / string) – the job description (should include instruction to apply)

Views¶

homeyess/website/views.py

views.index()¶

Renders the index / home page

Parameters

request (HttpRequest) – The http request containing user information or extra arguments

Returns

the rendered index page using the index.html template

Return type

HttpResponse
